Hero.title: Our Home Defines Us
Hero.description: Revanta Homes is a project by Rishabhdeo Builders & Developers. They build homes with timeless designs. Thet build homes which are beyond your dreams.

Features.title: Complete Facilities
Features.description: These homes contain all basic amenities and are of latest technology. Our home plans are original and are designed as per a resident's view. We build all our homes like our own. We aim to create homes that give a living experience that you deserve.

Footer.title: CLOSER TO NATURE
Footer.address: Revanta Homes, Ranipur Road, Gouthana, Betul (Madhya Pradesh)

Specification.title: Specification
Specification.description: We assure you that you'll get our best, as that's what we expect of ourselves.

image1.title: Structure
image1.description: Earthquake Resistant Structure with attractive elevation as per Architecture's Design

image2.title: Wall Finish
image2.description: Inside Wall Plaster with Double Coat Putty Finish. Double Coat Plaster with Texture and Acrylic Paint on Exterior Walls

image3.title: Doors & Windows
image3.description: Main Door Designer Flush Door with Wooden Frame & Natural Veneer. Motorized Main Door Lock. All Internal Door Locks, Stoppers and Hinges (Godrej or Equivalent Brand) . Internal Laminated Flush Doors. Premium Quality UPVC Windows.

image4.title: Doors & Windows
image4.description: Main Door Designer Flush Door with Wooden Frame & Natural Veneer. Motorized Main Door Lock. All Internal Door Locks, Stoppers and Hinges (Godrej or Equivalent Brand) . Internal Laminated Flush Doors. Premium Quality UPVC Windows.
